4.title: Auditions: Metro Manila

5.title: Manila Eliminations: Round 1
5.plot: All Golden Ticket Holders from around the Philippines came to Manila to vie for the top 90 slots that will continue on to be the next Pinoy Idol.

6.title: Manila Eliminations: Round 2
6.plot: The Top 90 are paired to sing duets and only 45 will continue on to be the next Pinoy Idol.

7.title: Manila Eliminations: Round 3 and Top 24 Revealed
7.plot: The Top 24 are the following: (Boys) Dio Paolo, JJ Jr., Robby Navarro, Elliot Andal, Warren Antig, Rye Estrada, Ram Chaves, Daryl Celis, Sherwin Marquez, Walton Zerrudo, Kid Camaya, and Toffer Rei. (Girls) Regene Ong, 'Mae Flores', Jayann Bautista, Bev Ejercito, Meryl David, 'Sue Ellen', Drizzle Muniz, Vren Villaflor, Gretchen Espina, Jeni Rawolle, Carol Leus, and Penelope.

8.title: The Top 24: Twelve Boys Perform
8.plot: Songs Performed: Robby Navarro -- "Whenever, Wherever, Whatever" (Maxwell) JJ Jr. -- "You to Me Are Everything" (The Real Thing) Elliot Andal -- "Sana Ay Ikaw na Nga" (Basil Valdez) Ram Chaves -- "My Hero" (Foo Fighters) Walton Zerrudo -- "She's Out of My Life" (Michael Jackson) Dio Paolo -- "Angels Brought Me Here" (Guy Sebastian) Rye Estrada -- "Your Love" (Alamid) Toffer Rei -- "Stigmatized" (The Calling) Sherwin Marquez -- "How Do You Heal a Broken Heart" (Chris Walker) Kid Camaya -- "A Song for You" (Elliot Yamin) Daryl Celis -- "Still with You" (Eric Benét) ...

9.title: The Top 24: Twelve Girls Perform
9.plot: Songs Performed: Regene Ong -- "Fever" (Elvis Presley) Drizzle Muniz -- "My Immortal" (Evanescence) Sue Ellen -- "Love Thang" (Michelle Williams) Jeni Rawolle -- "For Once In My Life" (Vonda Shephard) Vren Villaflor -- "Fame" (Irene Cara) Bev Ejercito -- "Crazy" (Norah Jones) Carol Leus -- "I Believe In You and Me" (Whitney Houston) Meryl David -- "You Mean The World To Me" (Toni Braxton) Gretchen Espina -- "Neither One Of Us" (Lani Misalucha) Penelope -- "Wild Horses" (Natasha Bedingfield) Mae Flores -- "Love Will Show You Everything" (Jennifer Love Hewitt) Jayann ...

10.title: Results Show: Top 20 Revealed
10.plot: Eliminated were: Dio Paolo, Elliot Andal, Drizzle Muniz, and Bev Ejercito

11.title: The Top 20: Ten Girls Perform
11.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Year They Were Born): Gretchen Espina -- "The Way You Make Me Feel" (Michael Jackson) Vren Villaflor -- "Wind Beneath My Wings" (Bette Midler) Mae Flores -- "Listen To Your Heart" (Roxette) Penelope -- "Everything I Do (I Do It For You)" (Bryan Adams) Jayann Bautista -- "Kiss" (Prince) Meryl David -- "I Feel For You" (Chaka Khan) Carol Leus -- "It Must Have Been Love" (Roxette) Regene Ong -- "With or Without You" (U2) Sue Ellen -- "More Than Words" (Extreme) Jeni Rawolle -- "Lean On Me" (Bill Withers)

12.title: The Top 20: Ten Boys Perform
12.plot: Songs Performed: (Theme: Year They Were Born) Walton Zerrudo -- "Every Breath You Take" (The Police) Kid Camaya -- "(There's) Always Something There to Remind Me" (Naked Eyes) Rye Estrada -- "Babe" (Styx) Sherwin Marquez -- "The Old Songs" (Barry Manilow) Warren Antig -- "Open Arms" (The Journey) Robby Navarro -- "What You Won't Do For Love" (Bobby Caldwell) Toffer Rei -- "I Want to Break Free" (Queen) JJ Jr. -- "King of Wishful Thinking" (Go West) Ram Chaves -- "Boys Don't Cry" (The Cure) Daryl Celis -- "True Colors" (Phil Collins)

13.title: Results Show: Top 16 Revealed
13.plot: Bottom Group: (Girls) Mae Flores, Vren Villaflor, Meryl David, and Gretchen Espina (Boys) Robby Navarro, Sherwin Marquez, Rye Estrada, and Ram Chaves. Eliminated were: Vren Villaflor, Regene Ong, Sherwin Marquez, Rye Estrada.

14.title: The Top 16: Eight Boys Perform
14.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Greatest Musical Influence): JJ Jr. -- "Signed, Sealed, Delivered I'm Yours" (Stevie Wonder) Toffer Rei -- "Something to Say" (Harem Scarem) Daryl Celis -- "Because of You" (Ne-Yo) Robby Navarro -- "Wild Flower" (Color Me Badd) Warren Antig -- "Billie Jean" (Michael Jackson) Ram Chaves -- "Kung Ayaw Mo, 'Wag Mo" (Rivermaya) Walton Zerrudo -- "Hello" (Lionel Richie) Kid Camaya -- "Love Always Finds A Way" (Peabo Bryson)

15.title: The Top 16: Eight Girls Perform
15.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Greatest Musical Influence): Jayann Bautista -- "Bleeding Love" (Leona Lewis) Meryl David -- "Killing Me Softly with His Song" (Roberta Flack) Jeni Rawolle -- "Too Darn Hot" (Ella Fitzgerald) Gretchen Espina -- "Wala Na Bang Pag-ibig?" (Jaya) Sue Ellen -- "Love Like This" (Natasha Bedingfield) Carol Leus -- "The Voice Within" (Christina Aguilera) Penelope -- "One Step At A Time" (Jordin Sparks) Mae Flores -- "Walk Away" (Kelly Clarkson)

16.title: Results Show: Top 14 Revealed
16.plot: Bottom Group: (Boys) Kid Camaya, Walton Zerrudo, and Toffer Rei (Girls) Mae Flores, Jeni Rawolle, and Meryl David. Eliminated were: Walton Zerrudo and Meryl David.

17.title: The Top 14: Seven Girls Perform
17.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Songs for Their Dad): Penelope -- "Papa, Can You Hear Me?" (Barbara Streisand) Sue Ellen -- "Thank You" (Dido) Mae Flores -- "Angels" (Robbie Williams) Jayann Bautista -- "I Am Changing" (Jennifer Hudson) Jeni Rawolle -- "You Raise Me Up" (Josh Groban) Carol Leus -- "I Turn to You" (Christina Aguilera) Gretchen Espina -- "Try It on My Own" (Whitney Houston)

18.title: The Top 14: Seven Boys Perform
18.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Songs for Their Dad): Ram Chaves -- "My Sacrifice" (Creed) Kid Camaya -- "Gone Too Soon" (Michael Jackson) JJ Jr. -- "When I Need You" (Leo Sayer) Warren Antig -- "Panaginip" (P. O. T.) Robby Navarro -- "If Tomorrow Never Comes" (Garth Brooks) Daryl Celis -- "Right Here Waiting" (Richard Marx) Toffer Rei -- "I Could Not Ask for More" (Edwin McCain)

19.title: Results Show: Final 12 Revealed
19.plot: Bottom Group: (Girls) Mae Flores and Carol Leus; (Boys) Daryl Celis and JJ Jr. Eliminated were: Carol Leus and JJ Jr.

20.title: The Final 12 Perform
20.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: My Greatest Performance): Sue Ellen -- "Survivor" (Destiny's Child) Penelope -- "Alone" (Heart) Kid Camaya -- "Ordinary People" (John Legend) Toffer Rei -- "Honestly" (Harem Scarem) Jeni Rawolle -- "Inseparable" (Natalie Cole) Jayann Bautista -- "(You Make Me Feel Like) A Natural Woman" (Aretha Franklin) Gretchen Espina -- "Respect" (Aretha Franklin) Warren Antig -- "Shout" (Tears For Fears) Daryl Celis -- "Superstar" (Delaney, Bonnie & Friends) Ram Chaves -- "With Arms Wide Open" (Creed) Mae Flores -- "You Oughta Know" (Alanis Morisette) Robby...

21.title: Results Show: Final 11 Revealed
21.plot: Bottom Group: Kid Camaya, Sue Ellen, and Jeni Rawolle. Eliminated: Jeni Rawolle.

22.title: The Final 11 Perform
22.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Dedication): Warren Antig -- "You Give Love A Bad Name" (Bon Jovi) Penelope -- "So Sick" (Ne-Yo) Mae Flores -- "If I Didn't Love You" (Tina Arena) Daryl Celis -- "Basta't Kasama Kita" (Dingdong Avanzado) Jayann Bautista -- "Whine Up" (Kat DeLuna) Toffer Rei -- "Changes In My Life" (Mark Sherman) Gretchen Espina -- "A House Is Not a Home" (Dionne Warwick) Robby Navarro -- "Someone That I Used To Love" (Natalie Cole) Kid Camaya -- "I'll Never Love This Way Again" (Dionne Warwick) Ram Chaves -- "Banal na Aso, Santong Kabayo" (Yano) Sue Ellen -- "...

23.title: Results Show: Final 10 Revealed
23.plot: Bottom Group: Warren Antig, Mae Flores, and Toffer Rei. Eliminated: Mae Flores

24.title: The Final 10 Perform
24.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Song of My Life): Ram Chaves -- "Yugyugan Na" (P.O.T.) Gretchen Espina -- "Follow Your Road" (Pauline Wilson) Warren Antig -- "Balong Malalim" (Juan dela Cruz Band) Sue Ellen -- "Jesus Take The Wheel" (Carrie Underwood) Toffer Rei -- "It's My Life" (Bon Jovi) Jayann Bautista -- "Better Days" (Dianne Reeves) Robby Navarro -- "Greatest Love of All" (Whitney Houston) Penelope -- "This Is My Now" (Jordin Sparks) Kid Camaya -- "The Warrior Is A Child" (Gary Valenciano) Daryl Celis -- "Kung Kailangan Mo Ako" (Rey Valera)

25.title: Results Show: Final 9 Revealed
25.plot: Bottom Group were Daryl Celis, Sue Ellen, and Robby Navarro. Eliminated: Robby Navarro.

26.title: Final 9 Perform
26.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Regine Velasquez Songs): Jayann Bautista -- "Pangarap Ko Ang Ibigin Ka" (Regine Velasquez) Toffer Rei -- "You Made Me Stronger" (Regine Velasquez) Penelope -- "What Kind of Fool Am I?" (Regine Velasquez) Daryl Celis -- "Sa Piling Mo" (Regine Velasquez and Ogie Alcasid) Kid Camaya -- "Narito Ako" (Regine Velasquez) Gretchen Espina -- "Kung Maibabalik Ko Lang" (Regine Velasquez) Ram Chaves -- "Tuwing Umuulan At Kapiling Ka" (Regine Velasquez) Sue Ellen -- "Dadalhin" (Regine Velasquez) Warren Antig -- "Urong Sulong" (Regine Velasquez)

27.title: Results Show: Final 8 Revealed
27.plot: Bottom Group: Toffer Rei, Sue Ellen, Kid Camaya, and Penelope. Eliminated: Sue Ellen

28.title: The Final 8 Perform
28.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Jaya's Songs): Warren Antig -- "Cool Change" (Jaya) Gretchen Espina -- "You Lift Me Up" (Jaya) Jayann Bautista -- "Laging Naroon Ka" (Jaya) Daryl Celis -- "Ikaw Lamang" (Jaya) Ram Chaves -- "Honesty" (Jaya) Kid Camaya -- "Kung Wala Na" (Jaya) Penelope -- "Beauty and Madness" (Jaya) Toffer Rei -- "Sometimes You Just Know" (Jaya)

29.title: Results Show: The Final 7 Revealed
29.plot: Bottom Group: Daryl Celis, Ram Chaves, and Toffer Rei. Eliminated: Toffer Rei

30.title: The Final 7 Perform
30.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: Songs of a Band): Ram Chaves -- "Sandalan" (6 Cycle Mind) Jayann Bautista -- "Akin Ka Na Lang" (Itchyworms) Daryl Celis -- "Nasaan Ka" (Pupil) Gretchen Espina -- "Ikaw Lang Ang Aking Mahal" (Brownman Revival) Kid Camaya -- "Stay" (Cueshe) Warren Antig -- "Kahit Kailan" (South Border) Penelope -- "Weak" (Freestyle)

31.title: Results Show: Final 6 Revealed
31.plot: Bottom Group: Warren Antig, Kid Camaya, and Penelope. Eliminated: Penelope.

32.title: The Final 6 Perform
32.plot: Songs Performed (Songs of Basil Valdez): Ram Chaves -- "Ngayon at Kailanman" (Basil Valdez) Jayann Bautista -- "You" (Basil Valdez) Warren Antig -- "Kung Ako'y Iiwan Mo" (Basil Valdez) Daryl Celis -- "Hanggang Sa Dulo Ng Walang Hanggan" (Basil Valdez) Gretchen Espina -- "Gaano Kadalas Ang Minsan" (Basil Valdez) Kid Camaya -- "Paano Ba Ang Mangarap" (Basil Valdez)

34.title: The Final 5 Perform
34.plot: Songs Performed (Theme: My Greatest Performance): Jayann Bautista -- "Finally" (Fergie) Kid Camaya -- "Careless Whisper" (George Michael) Daryl Celis -- "The Promise" (Martin Nievera) Ram Chaves -- "Bahay Yugyugan" (Francis Magalona) Gretchen Espina -- "I'm Here" (Fantasia Barrino)

35.title: Results Show: The Final 3 Revealed
35.plot: Eliminated: Kid Camaya and Daryl Celis. The Final 3 that will vie for the title are Jayann Bautista, Gretchen Espina, and Ram Chaves.

36.title: The Grand Final 3 Perform
36.plot: Songs Performed --> (1)(Judge's Choice): Jayann Bautista -- "I'll Never Love This Way Again" (Dionne Warwick; Wyngard Tracy's Choice), Ram Chaves -- "Bridge Over Troubled Water" (Simon & Garfunkel; Ogie Alcasid's Choice) and Gretchen Espina -- "For Your Eyes Only" (Sheena Easton; Jolina Magdangal's Choice); (2) (Favorite Mentor's Choice): Jayann Bautista -- "You'll Never Walk Alone - (Frank Sinatra; Regine Velasquez's Choice), Ram Chaves -- "I Don't Wanna Miss A Thing" (Aerosmith; Jaya's Choice) and Gretchen Espina -- "Stand Up For Love" (Destiny's Child; Jaya's ...

37.title: Pinoy Idol Winner
37.plot: Pinoy Idol Winner: Gretchen Espina; 1st Runner-up: Jayann Bautista; 2nd Runner-up: Ram Chaves
